title: Everlasting Life Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Buffet, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Organic market, bakery, deli, juice bar, and sit-down dining. Food is vegan soul food, hot and cold dishes. Located in Kingdom Square formerly known as Hampton Mall. Previously named Everlasting Life Soul Vegetarian. Also manages a vegan food truck serving the Washington DC area - see website.
